scripts.build: echo "building dream boot..." && yarn build:boot && echo "building dream..." && npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.build.json && yarn build:package-json
scripts.build:boot-core: rm -rf dist && APP_ROOT_PATH=$(pwd)/test-app npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.boot.json && APP_ROOT_PATH=$(pwd)/test-app npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.boot.json
scripts.build:core: APP_ROOT_PATH=$(pwd)/test-app yarn before:build:core && APP_ROOT_PATH=$(pwd)/test-app  npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.build.core.json && yarn after:build:core
scripts.before:build:core: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && APP_ROOT_PATH=$(pwd)/test-app yarn build:boot-core
scripts.after:build:core: cp .dream.yml dist/.dream.yml && mkdir dist/test-app/conf/env && cp test-app/conf/env/db.yml dist/test-app/conf/env/db.yml && yarn build:package-json
scripts.types:trace: rm -rf dist && APP_ROOT_PATH=$(pwd) npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.build.json --generateTrace ./typetrace --diagnostics && yarn analyze-trace ./typetrace --skipMillis 100 --forceMillis 300
scripts.types:trace-test-app: rm -rf dist && APP_ROOT_PATH=$(pwd) npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.trace.json --generateTrace ./typetrace --diagnostics && yarn analyze-trace ./typetrace --skipMillis 100 --forceMillis 300
scripts.format: yarn run prettier . --write && yarn run eslint src/ spec/ --ext .ts --fix
scripts.lint: yarn run eslint src/ spec/ --ext .ts && yarn run prettier . --check
